smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function updateViews is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function bindView is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function getViewAt is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class EditFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class Companion is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onViewCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onStart appears to be too complex.
The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.
The function bindView appears to be too complex.
The function onSharedPreferenceChanged appears to be too complex.
The function updateTile appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function update appears to be too complex.
The function onGetViewFactory appears to be too complex.
The function updateControlAppWidget appears to be too complex.
The function updateToggleAppWidget appears to be too complex.
The function updateDetailAppWidget appears to be too complex.
The function onActivityResult appears to be too complex.
The function onActivityResult appears to be too complex.
The function readContractions appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'EditFragment' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainActivity' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ContractionListFragment' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ViewActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function updateTile is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'Cursor.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'CloseableCursorWrapper'.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message:
savedInstanceState.getSerializable(
                    ContractionContract.Contractions.COLUMN_NAME_START_TIME) cannot be safely cast to Calendar.

savedInstanceState.getSerializable(
                    ContractionContract.Contractions.COLUMN_NAME_END_TIME) cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
findViewById(R.id.toolbar) cannot be safely cast to Toolbar.
findViewById(R.id.average_duration) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById(R.id.average_frequency) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
arguments.getSerializable(TimePickerDialogFragment.TIME_ARGUMENT) cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
adapter.getItem(selectedPosition) cannot be safely cast to Cursor.
activity cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
listView.adapter.getItem(checkedPosition) cannot be safely cast to Cursor.
findViewById(R.id.toolbar) cannot be safely cast to Toolbar.
findViewById(R.id.pager) cannot be safely cast to ViewPager.
findViewById(R.id.pager) cannot be safely cast to ViewPager.
findViewById(R.id.version) cannot be safely cast to TextView.

preferenceScreen.findPreference(
                    Preferences.APPWIDGET_BACKGROUND_PREFERENCE_KEY) cannot be safely cast to ListPreference.

preferenceScreen.findPreference(
                    Preferences.AVERAGE_TIME_FRAME_PREFERENCE_KEY) cannot be safely cast to ListPreference.
arguments.getSerializable(DatePickerDialogFragment.DATE_ARGUMENT) cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message:
Parentheses in (allData.moveToFirst() &&
                        allData.isNull(allData.getColumnIndex(ContractionContract.Contractions.COLUMN_NAME_END_TIME))) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: allData.moveToFirst() &&
                        allData.isNull(allData.getColumnIndex(ContractionContract.Contractions.COLUMN_NAME_END_TIME))

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface.
